channel.title: How do i lower my npc defence bonus?
channel.description:
Hi, for my new players training is a pain. it takes ages to hit. i was wondering how i could lower there defence bonus so my new players could hit more often.
thanks

item.title: How do i lower my npc defence bonus?
item.dc:creator: @The_Box_Noob The Box Noob
item.description:
@The_Box_Noob wrote:

Dont lower the Npc defence, higher the attack xp a hit. In client.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i lower my npc defence bonus?
